content.rendered:
Here you can see how a certain configuration of triangles clearly form the Golden Ratio (Phi ~1.618) rectangle within their interference patterns. Notice how many different intersections of basic pythagorean triangles you can see in the first image also, all this by simple triangles interfering with each others. This is information and math in visual form.
Now, with OmniGeometry, you can easily look at this pattern from another dimension, seen in the next image with the 6 points. And upping the points coming closer to a circle, you see what kind of information this number formation represents at higher levels of accuracy.
With OmniGeometry you can learn, see and feel math in visual form. Get a personal experience and personal feeling of what these shapes mean for you and how they represent archetypal things in our world.
This can even lead to deeper understanding of that which how our Universe is constructed, and how our internal patterns are constructed. The same rules of fractality and division of cells according to the Golden Ratio can be found in all the patterns that Nature produces.

With OmniGeometry you have the power to express these forms from many different angles instantly, rapidly iterating through sacred geometry patterns, in the process finding those patterns that somehow speak to you and that mean something to you. This finding of meaning in the patterns can help you to connect the dots in your thinking also, and ultimately even lead to having alltogether new ways to think about everything you do.

In that process you can also start to understand how and why natural patterns interweave in everything we do and ultimately create.

The seemingly simple rules define the most basic building blocks of our physical reality, and then from iteration and applied ratios and rules, lifeforms are created.  OmniGeometry is a way of expressing these patterns with great power, a highly developed one that helps you and let’s you focus on what’s important when exploring these creation patterns.
